mapper.select: SELECT w.*,f.flowname,b.businessname,c.customname,u.`name` from work w,flow f,business b,custom c,`user` u where w.fid = f.fid and w.bid = f.bid and b.bid = w.bid and c.cid = w.cid and w.creater = u.id and w.doer=#{uid} order by w.createtime

select w.*,i.comments,b.businessname,f.flowname,u.`name`,c.* from work w,indent i,business b,flow f,`user` u,custom c where w.oid=i.oid and w.bid=b.bid and w.fid = f.fid and w.creater =u.id and w.cid=c.cid and wid=#{wid}
mapper.update: UPDATE work SET doer=NULL WHERE wid=#{wid}
